name: Simplicité Software
tag_list: business-applications, model-driven-engine, model-driven, business-model-driven, applications-developement, agility, agile-development, paas, plaform-as-a-service, collaborative-platform, it-business, custom-applications
overview: Simplicité Software provides Simplicité®, an agile and collaborative platform for building, operating and using custom business applications. Together business and IT teams can design rapidly quality applications that fit business specific needs. The required skills are mainly oriented on applications configuration and the modeling of business requirements. Simplicité® is an innovative solution without code generation and relies on a business model-driven engine. Designed applications can be either deployed on-premises or in the cloud.
